text: Rivian is an electric adventure
vehicle manufacturer.
We want to use AWS to
enhance our products so that

they help our customers
be more safe, power

they help our customers
be more safe, power
more adventures, give them back more time
to do things that they really want.
We store hundreds of petabytes of data

that is collected from
our test fleet as well
as customer fleet of vehicles.

It is used for simulation
as well as training.
We use Mountpoint for Amazon S3
to gain four times better performance than
our previous solution.

We were able to get four
times faster downloads

and up to 2x faster upload
speeds for larger file sizes.

Mountpoint for Amazon S3
is extremely cost effective
because it is free to use.
It also allows developers

to naturally use file-based
operations to interact
with Amazon S3.

Engineers in autonomy can
use Mountpoint for Amazon S3

Engineers in autonomy can
use Mountpoint for Amazon S3

to directly access S3 without
having to make any changes

to their code, which is
developed locally using
file-based operations.

So they can translate this
code directly into cloud system
like Amazon EC2,

or they can use Batch with
containers or even EKS.

or they can use Batch with
containers or even EKS.
